item.title: Fri 29 December 2023: The Great KantÅ Earthquake and Massacre
item.description: DETAILS: Theme: The Great KantÅ Earthquake and Massacre 29 December 2023 9.30 PM WAT/CET Duration: ca. 79 minutes Watch party: https://stream.provo.lol It’s a hundred years this year since the Great KantÅ earthquake of 1923 shook the KantÅ region in Japan. It’s also a hundred years since, in the earthquake’s aftermath, people in the region committed the KantÅ Massacre. During the massacre, vigilantes—spurred on by rumours, racist hatred, and aided by police and government authorities—murdered an estimated 6,000 people of Korean descent, as well as non-Korean Japanese communists, socialists, and anarchists.
